sentence.Network_en: Feeling under the weather may be a result of overindulgence.
sentence.Network_cn: 心情不好可能是过度放纵造成的.

sentence.Network_en: Overindulgence in computer games contributes to myopia and obesity.
sentence.Network_cn: 过分沉迷于电脑游戏会导致近视和肥胖.

sentence.Network_en: Because of overindulgence in food and drink, he is really fat now.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于暴饮暴食, 他现在已经胖得没有人样儿了.
